com.schedule.loadbalance
类 RandomAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
  com.schedule.loadbalance.OnlineAlgorithm
      com.schedule.loadbalance.RandomAlgorithm

public class RandomAlgorithm
extends OnlineAlgorithm

Random scheduling algorithm: randomly generating a index and try to allocate VM to the generated index. If failed, try another index.

作者：
Minxian
